findings.title: Public function that could be declared external
findings.description: The following public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: Missing Events for Significant Transactions
findings.description: The missing event makes it difficult to track off-chain decimal changes. An event should be emitted for significant transactions changing the following variables: governance.

findings.title: Ownable contract not required
findings.description: The contract 'Ownable' is inherited by the AcknoLedgerToken contract but no functionality of the Ownable contract is used inside the AcknoLedgerToken contract.

findings.title: Missing zero address validation
findings.description: When setting the governance address or destination address, it should be checked for zero address to prevent loss of ownership or burning of tokens.
